title: APlusLift 6,600LB Portable Mid-Rise Scissor Lift - HW-SL6600X
body_html:
All Scissor Lifts

  • 3 Year (36 Months) Warranty!

  • CE Certified Lift Structure and Hydraulic System - Tested for 115% Dynamic Load Capacity and 150% Static Load Capacity

  • 55" Maximum Lifting Height with Adjustable Screw Pads

  • 88 9/16" Maximum Length and 78 3/4" Maximum Width

  • One Set of 2 3/4" Tall Truck Adapters Included

  • Dual 3 1/4" Hydraulic Cylinder Structure

  • Unique Triple Roller Design Added Stability and Greater Contact on Floor

APlusLift HW-SL6600X portable mid-rise scissor lift (auto hoist) is one of the most affordable scissor lift with 6,600 LB Heavy Duty Design. HW-SL6600X is the ideal scissor lift for low ceiling or adding a bay for seasonal increases in business. It provides a good working height for tire service, detailing, brakes and body work for the shop. Quick set up time and an extended raised height. It is built with quality materials and good workmanship. EVERY PART IS FULLY TESTED. The car lift is comparable to Known High-End Brands. Suggestions to improve our products and service are always welcome!

Free shipping to commercial address (in a business zone) with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Residential addresses with liftgate (curbside only; no placement inside a building or backyard): $150. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $200 Discount): Mobile (AL), Kansas City (MO), Tacoma (WA).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions
